Animated comedy, with the voices of Sandra Bullock, Pierre Coffin, Jon Hamm and Michael Keaton.(n)

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancee's latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller.(n)

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Astonishingly, it hatches into a cute baby sea monster and, although he tries his hardest to keep it concealed, the task is made almost impossible by the creature's alarming rate of growth. Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey.(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: In a move to identify suspected hijackers, an undercover police officer infiltrates the high-octane world of illegal late-night street racing by rival gangs. He is befriended by a champion driver, but when he also forms a bond with the racer's sister, he is pitched into a conflict of loyalties. Thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: French Connection II
programme.desc: Hard-nosed New York narcotics cop Popeye Doyle pursues a drug dealer to his lair in Marseille. However, he soon lives to regret his decision when he is captured by the criminal and subjected to a cruel revenge by being forcibly addicted to heroin. John Frankenheimer's thriller sequel, starring Gene Hackman, Fernando Rey, Bernard Fresson, Jean-Pierre Castaldi and Charles Millot.

programme.title: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: A crime writer is drawn into intrigue and danger while investigating the kidnapping of a baby boy and the murder of the child's wealthy father. Mystery thriller, starring John Ritter, Michele Scarabelli, Daphne Zuniga and Roddy McDowall.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A top-secret government agency has developed a seemingly unbreakable code - only for an autistic boy to crack it in an instant. Assassins succeed in gunning down his parents, but a maverick FBI agent investigating their deaths finds the child hiding in a closet, and resolves to shield him from the hitmen on his trail. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alec Baldwin and Miko Hughes.

programme.title: Freezer
programme.desc: Wisecracking ex-con Robert is kidnapped and held hostage in a walk-in freezer by Russian thugs, who are convinced he has $8million from them. As he struggles to fight back against the cold, he soon discovers he is not alone. Thriller, starring Dylan McDermott.

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: A smart-mouthed PR executive answers a public phone and the caller on the other end warns him that if he hangs up he will be shot. The unseen gunman then puts his target through a tortuous series of mind games, as well as incriminating him in the death of a bystander. Psychological thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Kiefer Sutherland, Katie Holmes and Forest Whitaker.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: A disgraced former cop is arrested by the FBI for illegal street racing, but his one-time colleagues offer him freedom in exchange for going on an undercover mission. Teaming up with an old racing friend and a customs official, he has to infiltrate and bring down a drug-trafficking operation. Thriller sequel, with Paul Walker reprising his role from The Fast and the Furious alongside Tyrese Gibson, Eva Mendes and Cole Hauser.

programme.title: Swelter
programme.desc: Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past. Drama, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Alfred Molina and Lennie James.

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone.

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: A parolee hitches a ride home on a maximum-security flight conveying some of America's deadliest criminals, and when they hijack the plane in mid-flight he is forced to intervene. Meanwhile, a US marshal has an ongoing battle on the ground to prevent the plane from being blown to pieces. Action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Steve Buscemi, Ving Rhames and Colm Meaney.

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: A CIA agent is diagnosed with a degenerative condition that results in him being forced to retire from the world of intelligence. When he receives word that a terrorist who once tortured him has resurfaced, he goes rogue and sets out to assassinate the man while he is still able. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Anton Yelchin and Irene Jacob.

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: Maverick cop Dirty Harry Callahan antagonises his superiors once more in his pursuit of a vigilante group responsible for murdering the city's most wanted criminals. However, he is unaware that the killers are some of his fellow officers - and are prepared to see him dead to keep their secret safe. Action thriller sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Hal Holbrook, Mitchell Ryan, David Soul and Robert Urich.

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: Two South African police officers, one black and one white, investigate the murder of a teenage girl. The case brings to light the lingering consequences of apartheid, and forces both men to face up to their own roles in their country's brutal history. Crime drama based on Caryl Ferey's novel, with Forest Whitaker and Orlando Bloom.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: Captive
programme.desc: A fugitive fleeing from a police manhunt is desperate to see his newborn son. Needing a hiding place, he takes a recovering meth addict hostage in her own home. The pair make an unlikely connection as they bond over finding ways to cope with the challenges in their lives. Fact-based drama, starring Kate Mara and David Oyelowo.

programme.title: Kidnapping Freddy Heineken
programme.desc: Five men struggling to make ends meet decide to kidnap a beer tycoon who is one of Europe's richest men. The plan is a success, and they demand the biggest ransom in history - but tensions within the group threaten their chances of escaping the law. Fact-based crime drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Jim Sturgess and Sam Worthington.

programme.title: The Maid's Room
programme.desc: A Colombian immigrant hired as a live-in maid at a luxurious summer house in Long Island witnesses something she shouldn't. Thriller, starring Paula Garces, Annabella Sciorra and Bill Camp.

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A newly separated teacher embarks on what she believes is a harmless flirtation with the handsome teenager living next door. In a moment of weakness, she succumbs to his advances, and things turn nasty when she tries to end their affair. Thriller, starring Jennifer Lopez, Ryan Guzman and Kristin Chenoweth.

programme.title: God's Pocket
programme.desc: A construction worker believes his life will be simpler following the death of his troublemaking stepson. However, he finds things go from bad to worse as his relationship with his wife deteriorates and a reporter grows suspicious about the tragedy. Drama based on Peter Dexter's novel, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Christina Hendricks and John Turturro.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: An American teenager is sent to live with his father in Tokyo after a brush with the law, but soon becomes involved in illegal street racing. When he ends up owing money to gangsters after losing a race against a driver with Yakuza connections, he has to learn to master the Japanese style of driving to win and pay back his debts. Action adventure, starring Lucas Black, Nathalie Kelley and Bow Wow.

programme.title: The Joker
programme.desc: A young cop is kidnapped by a masked serial killer. To keep himself alive, the captive detective must rely on the wisdom imparted to him by his older colleagues during their regular poker night, hoping that one of their tall tales might provide the inspiration he needs to outwit the murderer. Thriller, starring Beau Mirchoff and Ron Perlman.

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A newly separated teacher embarks on what she believes is a harmless flirtation with the handsome teenager living next door. In a moment of weakness, she succumbs to his advances, and things turn nasty when she tries to end their affair. Thriller, starring Jennifer Lopez, Ryan Guzman and Kristin Chenoweth.

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: Two supermarket checkout girls covering for their friends on Christmas Eve get drawn into a drugs sting and are forced to cross a dealer to save themselves. Their absent colleagues endure a disastrous night's gambling in Las Vegas, while two men forced to take part in the sting find themselves spending a festive night with a narcotics agent. Drama, starring Katie Holmes, William Fichtner and JE Freeman.

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Uncompromising detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan hunts the ringleaders behind a bizarre death lottery which is seemingly being used to murder well-known figures. The case becomes personal when he discovers his own name is on the list of prospective victims. Action thriller sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Patricia Clarkson, Liam Neeson and an early appearance by Jim Carrey.

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: A boxing champion's successful life is brought to an abrupt end when tragedy strikes. He turns to a trainer coaching amateur fighters in a run-down gym for help and tries to rebuild his sporting career - while also striving to regain the lost trust of his wife and daughter. Drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Forest Whitaker and Rachel McAdams.(n)

programme.title: Bound to Vengeance
programme.desc: A woman who is kidnapped fights back and manages to escape from her captor. She later learns she was not his only victim, and that there was a dark secret behind her abduction. The discovery drives her to hatch a plan to punish him for the suffering he has caused. Thriller, starring Tina Ivlev.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agent's nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersen's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott.(n)

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: The captain of Russia's first nuclear submarine is demoted for expressing fears that the vessel is unfit for commission. However, his anxieties prove well-founded when the reactor malfunctions, creating the possibility of a nuclear explosion the US would mistake for an attack - and potentially triggering a global conflict. Kathryn Bigelow's fact-based thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Liam Neeson and Peter Sarsgaard.(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: Cop John Anderton is forced to go on the run when a supposedly infallible trio of psychics foretell he is about to kill a man he has never heard of. Convinced their prediction is false, he kidnaps one of the so-called precogs to prove his innocence - and stumbles across a complex conspiracy. Steven Spielberg's futuristic thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton and Max von Sydow.(n)

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.(n)

programme.title: SWAT
programme.desc: A cop's career is seemingly over when he accidentally shoots a hostage while thwarting a bank robbery. He is given the chance to redeem himself by joining an elite unit headed by a veteran sergeant. Their mission is to escort an international crime lord in custody as he is taken to prison. However, they hit a snag when their prisoner offers a multimillion-dollar reward to anyone who breaks him out of jail, placing them under attack from every criminal in the city. Action thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson and Colin Farrell.(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: A political lobbyist recovering from a painful break-up forms a passionate new relationship with a charming stranger. However, she begins to wonder whether she can trust her new boyfriend has his behaviour grows increasingly volatile - a situation that only gets worse when her ex resurfaces. Thriller, starring Sanaa Lathan and Michael Ealy.(n)

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: An unlicensed boxing promoter and his dim-witted sidekick convince an Irish gypsy to step in for their injured fighter, but find themselves drawn into a match-fixing racket. Meanwhile, the loot from a diamond heist goes missing, leading to a bloody conflict between Russian gangsters and a Jewish mob. Guy Ritchie's comedy drama, with Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Benicio Del Toro and Stephen Graham.(n)

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers.(n)

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist tests an invisibility serum on himself, but becomes dangerously intoxicated by the power he acquires. He abandons his morals and heads out into the city to take full advantage of his condition. Realising he has been up to no good, concerned colleagues decide to confront him - with terrible consequences. Paul Verhoeven's sci-fi thriller, starring Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin and Kim Dickens.

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: A boy is left disillusioned with Christmas as his dysfunctional family spend the holiday arguing. They must soon learn to work together if they are to see New Year, when a monstrous demon appears, intent on punishing them for their lack of festive spirit - and which has the power to make the house's Christmas decorations take on murderous life. Comedy horror, starring Toni Collette and Emjay Anthony.

programme.title: Pay the Ghost
programme.desc: A professor's son vanishes without trace during a Halloween carnival. One year later, the academic becomes determined to solve the mystery of the boy's disappearance, but his search for answers leads him to encounter dangerous paranormal forces. Supernatural thriller based on a short story by Tim Lebbon, starring Nicolas Cage and Sarah Wayne Callies.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Seventh Son
programme.desc: An ageing professional monster hunter hires a young apprentice and sets about teaching him the tricks of his trade - and the duo will need to use them all if they are to recapture the evil queen of the witches after she escapes from the pit in which she was incarcerated. Fantasy adventure, starring Ben Barnes, Jeff Bridges and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: A group of children who escaped from an isolated community at the centre of a mysterious labyrinth find themselves in a desolate wasteland. As they seek the truth about the organisation that imprisoned them, they face a series of terrible dangers. Sci-fi adventure based on the second of James Dashner's series of novels, starring Dylan O'Brien and Kaya Scodelario.

programme.title: Star Wars: Rogue One Special
programme.desc: The making of the new standalone entry into the Star Wars series of movies, telling the story of the group of rebels who stole the plans for the original Death Star.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: An aspiring writer takes a caretaking job at a remote mountain hotel. It has closed for the winter, and he has been hired to get the place ready for the next season. But evil spirits haunting its corridors destroy his sanity, causing the unhinged author to rampage through the hotel and terrorise his wife and young son. Stanley Kubrick's horror, based on the Stephen King novel, with Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd and Scatman Crothers.

programme.title: Seventh Son
programme.desc: An ageing professional monster hunter hires a young apprentice and sets about teaching him the tricks of his trade - and the duo will need to use them all if they are to recapture the evil queen of the witches after she escapes from the pit in which she was incarcerated. Fantasy adventure, starring Ben Barnes, Jeff Bridges and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: Pay the Ghost
programme.desc: A professor's son vanishes without trace during a Halloween carnival. One year later, the academic becomes determined to solve the mystery of the boy's disappearance, but his search for answers leads him to encounter dangerous paranormal forces. Supernatural thriller based on a short story by Tim Lebbon, starring Nicolas Cage and Sarah Wayne Callies.

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: A group of children who escaped from an isolated community at the centre of a mysterious labyrinth find themselves in a desolate wasteland. As they seek the truth about the organisation that imprisoned them, they face a series of terrible dangers. Sci-fi adventure based on the second of James Dashner's series of novels, starring Dylan O'Brien and Kaya Scodelario.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: An aspiring writer takes a caretaking job at a remote mountain hotel. It has closed for the winter, and he has been hired to get the place ready for the next season. But evil spirits haunting its corridors destroy his sanity, causing the unhinged author to rampage through the hotel and terrorise his wife and young son. Stanley Kubrick's horror, based on the Stephen King novel, with Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd and Scatman Crothers.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A shy, withdrawn teenager discovers she has paranormal powers, which she uses to protect herself from her abusive mother and classmates. When a friendly student invites her to the prom, she is determined to enjoy herself and is amazed when she is crowned queen of the ball - but joy turns to fury when her tormentors play a cruel prank. Brian De Palma's adaptation of Stephen King's horror novel, with Sissy Spacek, Piper Laurie and Amy Irving.

programme.title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: Julie James, the survivor of the original bloody events, sets off for a holiday in the Bahamas - but as soon as she arrives, her arch-enemy returns from the dead, forcing her into a desperate battle for survival. Horror sequel, starring Jennifer Love Hewitt, Freddie Prinze Jnr, Brandy Norwood and Mekhi Phifer.

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: A group of friends using an online chatroom find themselves being stalked by an account in the name of a friend, who died a year earlier. Thriller, starring Shelley Hennig and Heather Sossaman.

programme.title: Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A weedy flower-shop assistant grows a bizarre plant, which he discovers needs to feed on human blood to survive. It grows to a vast size and begins to talk, demanding he commit murder on its behalf. Comedy musical based on the Broadway show, starring Rick Moranis, Ellen Greene, Steve Martin and Bill Murray, with the voice of The Four Tops' Levi Stubbs.

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Earth suffers a series of four devastating attacks from alien invaders, that leaves civilisation in ruins. As the human race awaits the fifth and final onslaught that will wipe them out, a teenage girl tries to protect her younger brother in a dangerous wilderness - and gets drawn into a plan to fight back against the aliens. Sci-fi adventure based on Rick Yancey's novel, starring Chloe Grace Moretz and Liev Schreiber.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Decades on from its first creation, Jurassic Park is now a fully operational attraction filled with genetically engineered dinosaurs. In need of a new attraction, the company behind the park creates an entirely new species - but it quickly escapes to terrorise the tourists. Action adventure sequel, starring Chris Pratt and Bryce Dallas Howard.

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: A group of friends using an online chatroom find themselves being stalked by an account in the name of a friend, who died a year earlier. Thriller, starring Shelley Hennig and Heather Sossaman.

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Earth suffers a series of four devastating attacks from alien invaders, that leaves civilisation in ruins. As the human race awaits the fifth and final onslaught that will wipe them out, a teenage girl tries to protect her younger brother in a dangerous wilderness - and gets drawn into a plan to fight back against the aliens. Sci-fi adventure based on Rick Yancey's novel, starring Chloe Grace Moretz and Liev Schreiber.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Decades on from its first creation, Jurassic Park is now a fully operational attraction filled with genetically engineered dinosaurs. In need of a new attraction, the company behind the park creates an entirely new species - but it quickly escapes to terrorise the tourists. Action adventure sequel, starring Chris Pratt and Bryce Dallas Howard.

programme.title: Pandemic
programme.desc: A doctor working to find a cure for a virus that has swept the world turning people into frenzied monsters. She joins a rescue team sent into the devastated ruins of Los Angeles in the hope of finding uninfected survivors. Thriller shot entirely from first-person perspectives, starring Rachel Nichols, Alfie Allen, Missi Pyle and Mekhi Phifer.

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: A dull American town in the middle of the desert is suddenly attacked by huge man-eating subterranean creatures. Luckily, two dimwitted but brave handymen step into the breach to lead a ragtag bunch of locals and a mismatched pair of survivalists in the battle against the gruesome worm-like monsters. Comedy horror, with Kevin Bacon, Fred Ward, Finn Carter, Michael Gross, Reba McEntire and Bobby Jacoby.(n)

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Film-makers venture deep into the Amazon jungle to document the lives of a remote tribe. However, the expedition is hijacked by a crazed hunter who plans to use them as bait to catch a gigantic killer snake. Adventure, starring Jennifer Lopez, Jon Voight, Ice Cube, Eric Stoltz and Jonathan Hyde.(n)

programme.title: Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A weedy flower-shop assistant grows a bizarre plant, which he discovers needs to feed on human blood to survive. It grows to a vast size and begins to talk, demanding he commit murder on its behalf. Comedy musical based on the Broadway show, starring Rick Moranis, Ellen Greene, Steve Martin and Bill Murray, with the voice of The Four Tops' Levi Stubbs.(n)

programme.title: The X Files
programme.desc: FBI special agents Mulder and Scully are reassigned from their paranormal investigations to deal with a terrorist attack on a government building. They discover the bombing is an attempt to cover up the existence of an alien virus that threatens all life on Earth. Sci-fi thriller based on the TV series, starring David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, Martin Landau and Armin Mueller-Stahl.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.(n)

programme.title: Android
programme.desc: A reclusive robotics expert shuts himself away from the world working on a secret project for years. He invites a science journalist to observe the fruits of his labours - an android capable of human emotion. However, they discover the machine has a dangerous side to its nature. Sci-fi thriller, starring Mark Webber and Lucy Griffiths.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan.(n)

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As he behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan.(n)

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As he behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.(n)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: American officer Aldo Raine leads a squad of soldiers into occupied France on a mission to kill as many Nazis as possible and spread fear through the Third Reich. They become involved in a Jewish resistance fighter's plan to blow up the premiere of a propaganda movie - due to be attended by Hitler himself. Quentin Tarantino's wartime adventure, with Brad Pitt, Melanie Laurent, Diane Kruger, Michael Fassbender and an Oscar-winning Christoph Waltz.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High
programme.desc: A lawman-turned-rancher is attacked by a lynch mob and hanged for a crime he did not commit, but is rescued before he dies. He returns to his former profession to hunt the mob down, but his desire for revenge clashes with his responsibility to bring them to trial alive. Western, starring Clint Eastwood, Inger Stevens, Ed Begley, James MacArthur, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: Rebel Without a Cause
programme.desc: An angry teenage social outcast rejects any form of authority in his search for a sense of identity. Eventually, he finds solace in the company of two like-minded and equally alienated misfits. However, a spate of violent confrontations forces them to go on the run, and their plan to stay in hiding has tragic consequences. Drama, starring James Dean, Natalie Wood, Sal Mineo and Jim Backus.

programme.title: Partisan
programme.desc: A young boy raised to be an assassin starts to question the ways of his community's charismatic and domineering leader. Drama, with Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel and Florence Mezzara.

programme.title: Dope
programme.desc: A geeky teenager in an inner-city neighbourhood harbours dreams of going to Harvard. He and his friends think their social standing at school is set to improve when they get an invitation to an underground party, but the night leaves them mixed up in crime and drugs and forced to grow up fast. Crime comedy, starring Shameik Moore and Tony Revolori.

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson.

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: A veteran CIA agent is on the verge of retirement, but when he learns his former protege has been thrown into a Chinese prison and is awaiting execution, he decides to launch a perilous and ill-advised rescue attempt. Thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Robert Redford, Catherine McCormack and Stephen Dillane.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A bookish CIA researcher returns to his field office to find all his colleagues have been murdered in his absence. When he tries to uncover the truth, he also ends up targeted for assassination by his own agency, and is forced to go on the run to discover the reasons why. Sydney Pollack's thriller, starring Robert Redford, Faye Dunaway, Cliff Robertson and Max von Sydow.

programme.title: I Origins
programme.desc: A biologist researching the evolution of eyes uncovers shocking evidence that suggests people are reincarnations of the dead - a fact that could have far-reaching consequences for the human race. Drama, starring Michael Pitt, Brit Marling and Archie Panjabi.

programme.title: Partisan
programme.desc: A young boy raised to be an assassin starts to question the ways of his community's charismatic and domineering leader. Drama, with Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel and Florence Mezzara.

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward teenager shuns all kinds of social interaction, apart from making films with his best friend. His well-meaning mother urges him to spend time with a girl who has been diagnosed with leukaemia, and they unexpectedly develop a firm friendship. However, his life is changed forever as her condition gets worse. Comedy drama based on Jesse Andrews' novel, starring Thomas Mann, RJ Cyler and Olivia Cooke.

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson.

programme.title: Dope
programme.desc: A geeky teenager in an inner-city neighbourhood harbours dreams of going to Harvard. He and his friends think their social standing at school is set to improve when they get an invitation to an underground party, but the night leaves them mixed up in crime and drugs and forced to grow up fast. Crime comedy, starring Shameik Moore and Tony Revolori.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow
programme.desc: A pimp and drug pusher decides to change his ways after reaching the age at which his father died. Using his experience of life on the streets, he becomes a rapper, and an encounter with a local hip-hop star gives him the perfect chance to begin his career in music. Drama, starring Terrence Howard, Anthony Anderson, Taryn Manning and Isaac Hayes.

programme.title: Colt 45
programme.desc: Vincent, a young police firearms expert, is forced to make use of his skills as a marksman when he is ambushed by an unknown assailant. Left with a killing to cover up, Vincent turns to a fellow gun enthusiast with ties to the criminal underworld offers to help him dispose of the evidence. In exchange, he hands over a small arsenal of weapons - including a set of home-made, explosive .45 ammo, but when said guns are used in a string of deadly robberies, Vincent must turn to seasoned police commander Chavez to help correct his fatal error of judgement. French action thriller, starring Ymanol Perset, Joey Starr and Gerard Lanvin.

programme.title: Cub
programme.desc: A young boy goes on a camping trip with his fellow Cub Scouts, and crosses paths with a bloodthirsty poacher. Belgian horror, starring Maurice Luijten, Evelien Bosmans and Titus De Voogdt. In Flemish, French and Dutch.

programme.title: Michael Jackson's This Is It
programme.desc: Documentary following rehearsals for the singer's planned 50-night series of concerts at London's O2, immediately before his death in 2009. Featuring interviews with Jackson, performances of classic hits including Billy Jean and Wanna Be Startin' Something, and an insight into the elaborate preparations for the shows that were never staged.

programme.title: Long Way North
programme.desc: A Russian aristocrat travels to the North Pole in search of her grandfather, a missing explorer. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chloe Dunn, Geoffrey Greenhill and Tom Morton.

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager relishes her newfound freedom when her mother goes missing, seizing the opportunity to flirt with the boy next door and a cop on the case. Over time, she begins to realise what she has lost and finds the unexplained details of the disappearance haunting her. Mystery based on Laura Kasischke's novel, starring Shailene Woodley and Eva Green.

programme.title: Stations of the Cross
programme.desc: A girl from a strict Catholic family is an outsider in her secular school, and faces constant reproach from her fundamentalist mother. Under the tuition of a misguided priest, she pushes herself to extreme acts of self-sacrifice in her pursuit of spiritual redemption. Drama, starring Lea van Acken and Florian Stetter. In German, French and Latin.

programme.title: The Black Orchid
programme.desc: A gangster's widow blames herself for her husband's death, as she becomes the subject of malicious rumours that she drove him to a life of crime. A man who is also widowed falls in love with her, but his daughter is determined to stop them from marrying. Comedy, starring Sophia Loren, Anthony Quinn, Ina Balin and Peter Mark Richman.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Biopic of hip hop group NWA, examining their rise to fame in the 1980s. The five members of the group drew inspiration from their anger at the dangerous world they saw around them, producing hard-hitting songs about urban life that redefined a musical genre. Starring O'Shea Jackson Jr, Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell, Neil Brown Jr and Aldis Hodge.

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: A series of devastating personal traumas leave a woman feeling self-destructive and lost. After spending years behaving recklessly, she decides to turn things around by embarking on an epic, solo trek along America's 1,000-mile-long Pacific Crest Trail, which gives her the time and space to reassess her existence. Drama based on a true story, starring Reese Witherspoon and Laura Dern.

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: A frontiersman leading a hunting party through the wilderness is mauled by a bear, and a travelling companion who pledged to stay with him until help comes kills his son and leaves him for dead. Against all odds, the wounded man survives his injuries and embarks on a gruelling quest for revenge that takes him through a harsh landscape. Western, starring an Oscar-winning Leonardo DiCaprio, with Tom Hardy and Domhnall Gleeson.

programme.title: Couple in a Hole
programme.desc: A couple choose to live in a cave in the woods, surviving by hunting rabbits and feeding on insects. When the wife is bitten by a poisonous spider, they are forced to reconnect with the outside world and turn to a farmer for help, who takes a suspicious interest in their reasons for renouncing civilisation. Drama, starring Paul Higgins and Kate Dickie.

programme.title: Wild at Heart
programme.desc: An Elvis-obsessed ex-con and his lover set off on a nightmarish journey across America pursued by a variety of bizarre and deadly characters. David Lynch's dark road movie, starring Nicolas Cage, Laura Dern, Diane Ladd, Willem Dafoe, Harry Dean Stanton and Isabella Rossellini.(n)

programme.title: The Survivalist
programme.desc: A loner survives the downfall of civilisation, living in a remote cabin on a small plot of land. When two women discover his refuge, he grudgingly allows them food and shelter, but they struggle to trust one another, especially as the supplies begin to run out. Thriller, starring Martin McCann and Mia Goth.(n)

programme.title: Rams
programme.desc: Two brothers have tended a herd of sheep together for 40 years, but never speak to each other. When a disease outbreak prompts the government to impose a cull on livestock, they put their differences aside to protect their animals - each using his own unusual methods. Drama, starring Sigurdur Sigurjonsson and Theodor Juliusson. In Icelandic.(n)

programme.title: Living Is Easy with Eyes Closed
programme.desc: An English teacher in Spain picks up two hitchhikers on his quest to meet John Lennon. Comedy drama set in 1966, starring Javier Camara, Natalia de Molina and Francesc Colomer.(n)

programme.title: American Ultra
programme.desc: Small-town store clerk and unmotivated stoner Mike is enjoying his life with girlfriend Phoebe when his world is suddenly turned upside down. He is unaware he is actually a highly trained, lethal government sleeper agent who has been targeted for assassination, forcing him to summon his inner action-hero in order to survive. Action comedy, starring Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart.(n)

programme.title: A Fistful of Dollars
programme.desc: A mysterious gunslinger rides into a town on the Mexican border divided by two warring families. After killing the henchmen of one clan, he seems to have made it clear where his loyalties lie and is hired by their rivals. However, he is secretly planning to play them off against each other to his own advantage. Sergio Leone's Western, with Clint Eastwood making his first appearance as The Man with No Name alongside Gian Maria Volonte and Marianne Koch.(n)

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More
programme.desc: An enigmatic gunslinger forms an uneasy alliance with a military veteran to track down a notorious outlaw - but tensions simmer as their very different motives for the hunt put them increasingly at odds. Sergio Leone's Western sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volonte, Josef Egger, Mara Krup and Klaus Kinski.(n)

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: A laconic gunslinger, a ruthless hired killer and a conniving outlaw hunt for a cache of loot during the chaos of the American Civil War. However, each is privy to only part of the information necessary to find it, setting in motion a series of deadly betrayals. The third film in Sergio Leone's Spaghetti Western trilogy, starring Clint Eastwood as the Man with No Name, with Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach. With a soundtrack by Ennio Morricone.(n)

programme.title: The Crow's Egg
programme.desc: Comedy-drama following a pair of poverty stricken Indian brothers determined to earn the money to eat at a new pizza parlour. Starring Vignesh, Ramesh and Iyshwarya Rajesh.(n)

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: A talented thief uses hi-tech devices to enter other people's dreams so he can steal their secrets. An industrialist hires him to perform a far more challenging job - to implant an idea into a corporate heir's mind, so he will think it is his own. However, the mission is compromised by the thief's own troubled psyche. Christopher Nolan's sci-fi thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Ellen Page, Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Tom Hardy.(n)

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: Five criminals are brought together by a police line-up, and decide to join forces to pull off one more big job. However, they discover their meeting was not a coincidence and that a mysterious crime lord has plans for them. Bryan Singer's Oscar-winning thriller, starring Gabriel Byrne, Kevin Spacey, Benicio Del Toro, Kevin Pollak, Stephen Baldwin, Pete Postlethwaite, Chazz Palminteri and Suzy Amis.(n)

programme.title: Split Interview Special
programme.desc: Director M Night Shyamalan and star James McAvoy talk about the psychological and storytelling complexities of their creepy collaboration Split.

programme.title: No
programme.desc: In 1988, Chile's military dictator Augusto Pinochet is forced by international pressure to hold a referendum on his continued rule. An advertising executive is recruited by the opposition leaders, and despite limited resources and the threat of the tyrant's forces, launches a campaign to liberate the nation. Fact-based drama, starring Gael Garcia Bernal and Alfredo Castro. In Spanish.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: A district attorney is determined to convict a vagrant of killing a prominent clergyman. However, as the lawyer delves deeper into the case, he begins to suspect the defendant may in fact be innocent. Crime drama based on a real-life murder case of the 1920s, starring Dana Andrews, Lee J Cobb, Arthur Kennedy, Jane Wyatt, Ed Begley and Karl Malden.

programme.title: Drums Along the Mohawk
programme.desc: Settlers find the dream of starting a new life in a remote valley threatened when the American War of Independence breaks out. They soon come under threat both from British forces and a Mohawk tribe angry at intruders in its territory. John Ford's historical drama, starring Henry Fonda and Claudette Colbert.

programme.title: Twelve O'Clock High
programme.desc: A US Air Force officer takes command of a bomber squadron based in England, and has to suppress his humane instincts to restore morale and discipline - a task which places a heavy strain on his mental state and brings his weary men to the edge of endurance. Oscar-winning Second World War drama, with Gregory Peck, Hugh Marlowe, Gary Merrill and Dean Jagger.

programme.title: Sword of Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: Legendary outlaw hero Robin Hood rallies his merry men to thwart a dastardly plan by the Sheriff of Nottingham to murder the Archbishop of Canterbury, who has denounced the sheriff's plot to confiscate another nobleman's land. Medieval adventure, starring Richard Greene, Peter Cushing, Niall MacGinnis, Richard Pasco, Sarah Branch and Oliver Reed.

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: A peasant boy, who has a special bond with animals and fairies, shows his sweetheart the last surviving unicorns. Unfortunately, a monstrous demon and his goblin henchmen despise the mythical creatures and trick the girl into harming one of them, forcing Jack to act quickly to save her immortal soul. Ridley Scott's fantasy adventure, starring Tom Cruise, Mia Sara, Tim Curry and David Bennent.

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: A spacecraft is sent to another world, following clues left in ancient artefacts, in search of aliens that may have created the human race. However, the explorers on board discover the extraterrestrials may not be the benevolent creatures they imagined, while the company funding the expedition has its own agenda. Ridley Scott's sci-fi thriller and Alien prequel, starring Noomi Rapace, Michael Fassbender, Charlize Theron and Idris Elba.

programme.title: Welcome to the Punch
programme.desc: A criminal evades the law after a heist and goes into hiding overseas, leaving the detective on his trail tormented by his failure. He gets a second chance when the crook returns to visit his hospitalised son, but the investigation brings to light a conspiracy that threatens both men. Crime thriller, starring James McAvoy, Mark Strong, Andrea Riseborough and David Morrissey.

programme.title: Drug War
programme.desc: A drug dealer is hospitalised following an accident, which leads to him being identified by the police and facing the death penalty. He agrees to help bring down the criminal organisation he works for in return for his life, assisting undercover officers to infiltrate the syndicate. Gangster thriller, starring Louis Koo and Ka Tung Lam. In Mandarin and Cantonese.

programme.title: Forty Guns
programme.desc: A despotic Arizona landowner, who uses a band of hired gunmen to dominate her territory, becomes attracted to a determined US marshal sent to restore order. The lawman has renounced violence, but when tragedy strikes on the day of his wedding, he takes up arms once again. Western, starring Barbara Stanwyck, with Barry O'Sullivan and Dean Jagger.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Wealthy eccentric Sir Vincent Brampton arrives in Nairobi intent on hunting a legendary man-eating lion, and employs the services of disgraced big-game hunter Ken Duffield, who decides to use the expedition as an opportunity to settle an old score with the ruthless Kenyan terrorist who murdered his son. Adventure set during the Mau Mau Uprising in Kenya, starring Victor Mature, Roland Culver and Earl Cameron.

programme.title: The Mark of Zorro
programme.desc: A 19th-century nobleman returns to his Californian home to find the local people cowed by the tyranny of a cruel military officer. Adopting the guise of a masked hero, he fights oppression wherever he finds it, while posing as a foppish aristocrat in his day-to-day life to divert suspicion. Swashbuckling adventure, starring Frank Langella, Ricardo Montalban, Gilbert Roland and Yvonne De Carlo.

programme.title: The Straight Story
programme.desc: An old man embarks on a bizarre cross-country journey to visit his estranged brother, hoping to heal the rift between them before it is too late. Though his eyesight leaves much to be desired, he carries on regardless - choosing a motorised lawnmower as his form of transport. David Lynch's drama, starring Richard Farnsworth, Sissy Spacek, Jane Galloway, Everett McGill and Harry Dean Stanton.

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: The daughter of the US president is determined to lead a normal life and manages to persuade him to let her enrol at college as a normal student. However, she is unaware her father has hired a young special agent to go undercover at the same college - which creates a dilemma when she falls in love with him. Romantic comedy, starring Katie Holmes, Marc Blucas, Michael Keaton and Amerie.

programme.title: Lincoln
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's biopic of the 16th president of the United States. In his tumultuous final months in office, Abraham Lincoln faces a struggle to bring the Civil War to an end and unite a divided nation, while also bringing about legislation to abolish slavery. Starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Tommy Lee Jones, Sally Field and Joseph Gordon-Levitt.

programme.title: End of Watch
programme.desc: Two Los Angeles cops make their regular patrol of the city, dealing with petty offences while one records their lives on camera for a documentary project. The officers end up in over their heads when they stumble on evidence that could bring down a drug cartel, putting them squarely in the gang's firing line. Crime thriller, with Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Pena.

programme.title: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
programme.desc: The perpetually stoned duo plan a trip to Amsterdam, but no sooner have they boarded the plane when they are arrested for terrorist offences and shipped off to the notorious prison camp. Comedy sequel, starring John Cho, Kal Penn, Neil Patrick Harris and Rob Corddry.(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien ambassador lands his spaceship in America and warns humanity that Earth risks imminent destruction by an interplanetary alliance unless it abandons its warlike ways - and is promptly shot by the military. The wounded visitor is forced to live among humans, but his powerful robot servant is poised to punish mankind for its aggression. Sci-fi drama, with Michael Rennie, Patricia Neal and Hugh Marlowe.(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Navigator
programme.desc: A boy mysteriously disappears in 1978, and is found eight years later, having not aged a day. He escapes being experimented on by government scientists by taking off in a crashed alien spaceship. With the help of the robot pilot, he tries to find out what has happened to him and if he can get back home. Sci-fi adventure, starring Joey Cramer and Veronica Cartwright, with the voice of Paul Reubens.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World
programme.desc: An egocentric professor leads an expedition on a journey into the Amazon on a mission to prove his theory that dinosaurs still survive there. On arrival, they find the prehistoric beasts are all too real - and only one of the dangers they face. Fantasy adventure, based on Arthur Conan Doyle's classic novel, starring Claude Rains, Michael Rennie and Jill St John.(n)

programme.title: One Fine Day
programme.desc: The working day for two mismatched single professionals is thrown into turmoil when their children have to stay at home after missing a school trip. The pair agree to take it in turns to babysit while struggling to stick to their hectic schedules - but during the course of the day their feelings for each other blossom unexpectedly. Romantic comedy, starring George Clooney, Michelle Pfeiffer, Charles Durning and Mae Whitman.(n)

programme.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
programme.desc: A librarian suffers from a strange condition that causes him to involuntarily move backwards and forwards in time. He marries a woman who was already in love with him after an encounter in his future and her past, but his journeys through history put a strain on their relationship, especially as he learns more about events that have yet to happen. Romantic sci-fi drama based on Audrey Niffenegger's novel, starring Rachel McAdams and Eric Bana.(n)

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Four American soldiers are sent on a mission into the mountains of Afghanistan to track down and eliminate a high-ranking terrorist leader. They soon find themselves faced with a terrible moral dilemma and a battle for survival against overwhelming odds. Fact-based drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Taylor Kitsch, Emile Hirsch and Ben Foster.(n)

programme.title: Dressed to Kill
programme.desc: A psychiatrist joins forces with a prostitute to investigate the murder of a patient, a frustrated middle-aged housewife who indulged her fantasies by embarking on an extramarital affair and was subsequently killed. Brian De Palma's thriller, starring Michael Caine, Angie Dickinson, Nancy Allen, Keith Gordon and Dennis Franz.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandpa gives the family cause for concern when he suffers a heart attack.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy investigates a hit-and-run incident when his younger brother is charged with the crime.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: During a stormy night, Laura and Mary are taken hostage by escaped convicts and held in the school. When one of their number falls ill, they demand Laura fetch a doctor - but she returns with her father.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura delights in teaching a shy boy how to communicate using sign-language, but reckons without the youngster falling in love with her. Letting him down gently, she admits that her heart belongs to another - but must pluck up the courage to tell the object of her affections to his face.

programme.title: A Dangerous Affair
programme.desc: A high-flying career woman thinks she has met the man of her dreams - until he reveals his true colours by subjecting her to a cruel campaign of obsessive stalking and torment. Thriller, starring Connie Sellecca, Gregory Harrison and Christopher Meloni.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John manages to upset Grandpa, who decides to pack his clothes and leave home, with Grandma in tow.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. Charles is badly injured while walking in the woods with Laura, and only a blind man can save their lives. Guest starring Burl Ives.

programme.title: Diana: Her True Story
programme.desc: Part two of two. Biopic of Diana, Princess of Wales, based on Andrew Morton's biography, starring Serena Scott Thomas and David Threlfall.

programme.title: Ordinary Miracles
programme.desc: Kind-hearted judge Kay Woodbury refuses to believe a surly juvenile delinquent is beyond help, and takes the teenager in - but her efforts at rehabilitation are met with rebellious behaviour. Deciding the root of the problem lies in the girl's troubled past, Kay sets out to track down her father. Drama, starring Jaclyn Smith, Lyndsy Fonseca and C Thomas Howell.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob ends up in hospital with appendicitis, forcing Grandpa and John-Boy to rely on a famous author to help them complete an important contract.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The church needs a new bell, creating tension between the Kennedys and the Olesons.

programme.title: The Good Times Are Killing Me
programme.desc: A successful lawyer from Washington DC, Kate Derby, collapses and falls unconscious as she travels to London to gather information for a case. When she awakens, she is in a secured drug and alcohol rehab facility, and is convinced she has been framed by the man she is mounting a case against. Inside, she befriends a couple of strange characters, who help her crack an important case. Drama, starring Kelly Rowan and Rupert Graves.

programme.title: The Price of a Broken Heart
programme.desc: A woman learns her husband has been having an affair with his secretary for years and plans to abandon his family for her. The spurned wife responds by suing her husband's lover for $1million under a long-forgotten state law - resulting in a case that has far-reaching consequences for American divorce law. Fact-based drama, starring Laura Innes, Park Overall and Timothy Carhart.

programme.title: The Babysitter's Seduction
programme.desc: When the wife of her wealthy employer is found dead, unsuspecting babysitter Michelle is drawn into a sinister plot and finds herself being accused of murder by a determined detective. Thriller, starring Keri Russell, Stephen Collins, Phylicia Rashad and Tobin Bell.

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: DCS Brian Holmes arrives to investigate Robbie for corruption, putting pressure on Michael to reveal the truth. Meanwhile, the detectives investigate the case of a man found dead at a health farm.

programme.title: In the Best Interest of the Children
programme.desc: A manic depressive woman is released from an institution and tries to regain custody of her five children. However, their foster parents wish to officially adopt them, and her eldest daughter believes that would be for the best. As a bitter legal battle ensues, the mother's mental health begins to deteriorate once more. Fact-based drama, starring Sarah Jessica Parker and Sally Struthers.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John and Olivia help Ike get to know cousin Corabeth better.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy encounters a beautiful but unprincipled girl whose selfish ways cause hard feelings and suspicion toward Jim Bob's friend, Danny. Richard Thomas stars.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: May We Make Them Proud - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Albert leaves a smoking pipe in the basement of the school for the blind, and tragedy strikes when the building is engulfed in fire - causing the death of two children.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: May We Make Them Proud - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Albert is beside himself by guilt over causing the fire which claimed the lives of the Garveys and Mary's children. As the devastated mothers try to cope with their losses, he finds comfort from an unlikely source.

programme.title: A Touch of Hope
programme.desc: A man discovers he has the abilities of a faith healer. Initially reluctant, he agrees to use his gift to help doctors, but only in emergency cases. However, many in the medical community are suspicious of his claims, a conflict that comes to a head when he is asked to bring a doubting doctor's daughter out of a coma. Fact-based drama, starring Anthony Michael Hall, CCH Pounder, Abraham Benrubi and Fay Masterson.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia helps a friend's daughter arrange her wedding, but the groom has one or two reservations concerning their plans.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Christmas is coming and the children are stranded as a blizzard strikes Walnut Grove.

programme.title: Diana: Her True Story
programme.desc: Part two of two. Biopic of Diana, Princess of Wales, based on Andrew Morton's biography, starring Serena Scott Thomas and David Threlfall.

programme.title: Gossip
programme.desc: After emerging from a bitter divorce battle, single mother Joanna returns to the sleepy home town she could not wait to flee as a teenager. As she sets about rekindling old friendships, Joanna finds herself falling in love with an old flame. However, the man is married, and the pair's affair threatens to rock the community. Romantic drama, starring Kelli Williams and Kristen Holden-Ried.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Cousins Ham, Cora and Job come to stay on Walton's Mountain, but they prove to be out-and-out crooks.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary is forbidden from taking a scholarship exam after she accidentally sets fire to the barn, but Laura fears she will defy their mother.

programme.title: Return to Zero
programme.desc: A couple expecting their first child are devastated by the news that the child will be stillborn. They resort to alcohol and infidelity to cope with their grief, ultimately destroying their marriage. However, when they learn they are expecting another child, they anxiously face an uncertain future. Fact-based drama, with Minnie Driver, Paul Adelstein, Alfred Molina and Connie Nielsen.

programme.title: Those She Left Behind
programme.desc: Affluent expectant parents Scott and Sue Grimes look forward to starting the next stage of their lives with the arrival of their first child. However, when Sue unexpectedly dies in childbirth, Scott is forced to navigate the difficulties of raising his new daughter alone, and must summon the fortitude to tackle life as a single parent. Drama, starring Gary Cole and Mary Page Keller.

programme.title: The Kansas City Massacre
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a prison break in 1933 that left several law enforcement officers dead and the campaign by the FBI, under the leadership of the renowned agent Melvin Purvis, to bring the killers to justice. Starring Dale Robertson and Bo Hopkins.

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: A radio therapist's tangled personal life comes under scrutiny as the women associated with him are murdered one by one, beginning with his wife. The team follow up a number of leads, but first have to work out just what motivates the threatened celebrity - before the killer notches up another victim. Gritty crime drama, starring James Macpherson, Blythe Duff, John Michie and Colin McCredie.

programme.title: First Do No Harm
programme.desc: A woman decides to seek alternative forms of treatment for her epileptic son after the conventional methods employed by his doctors fail to have an impact on his welbeing. However, she encounters resistance from members of the medical establishment, who seek to take legal action to stop her removing her child from the hospital. Drama, based on a true story, starring Meryl Streep.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John manages to upset Grandpa, who decides to pack his clothes and leave home, with Grandma in tow.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia helps a friend's daughter arrange her wedding, but the groom has one or two reservations concerning their plans.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Almanzo's brother Perley arrives in Walnut Grove, and his skill with a sick horse makes a good impression on Charles, who thinks he would be a perfect match for Laura. However, as time passes it becomes clear that one of the Wilder brothers already has his eye on her.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Nels Oleson takes his travelling store into the countryside in a bid to escape his nagging wife's harsh tongue - but doesn't expect to fall in love. Drama, starring Richard Bull.(n)

programme.title: Hearts Adrift
programme.desc: A mother and daughter's humdrum small-town life is radically changed by a trip to spend a weekend with a family friend in the country. Romantic drama, starring Sydney Penny, Scott Reeves, Kathleen Noone and Nicolas Coster.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason looks to develop his musical skills further by applying to win a scholarship for the Klineberg Conservatory.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandpa wins a raffle, but Grandma is upset to learn that his prize is a statue which reminds him of one of his ex-girlfriends.(n)

programme.title: A Day for Thanks on Walton's Mountain
programme.desc: As Thanksgiving approaches, Elizabeth resolves to gather the entire Walton family together again for an old-fashioned celebration - but struggles to persuade everyone to attend. Drama, starring Kami Cotler, Ralph Waite, Jon Walmsley and Ellen Corby.(n)

programme.title: Stranger in the Family
programme.desc: A teenager is involved in a tragic car accident, leaving him with severe amnesia. During his struggle to come to terms with alienation and the consequent rebellion that ensues, his family are forced to accept the boy they once knew so well is now a stranger. Fact-based drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Teri Garr, Randle Mell and Sierra Samuel.(n)

programme.title: Those She Left Behind

programme.title: Someone Else's Child
programme.desc: Fact-based drama charting the tragic consequences of a maternity unit mix-up. Starring Lisa Hartman, Bruce Davison and Louise Fletcher.(n)

programme.title: Safe Harbor
programme.desc: A retired couple preparing to embark on a round-the-world sailing trip find themselves looking after a group of troubled teenage boys. The arrangement changes from short term to several months, but the experience proves a rewarding one for them and the kids, inspiring the couple to set up their own foster home. Drama, starring Treat Williams and Nancy Travis.(n)

programme.title: Betty & Coretta
programme.desc: The widows of Martin Luther King and Malcolm X are left to raise their children alone following the assassination of their husbands. A close and supportive friendship develops between them as they deal with the challenges ahead and take up leading positions in the struggle for racial equality. Fact-based drama, with Angela Bassett and Mary J Blige.(n)

programme.title: Ride to Freedom: The Rosa Parks Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the life of Rosa Parks, the black woman who famously refused to give up her seat on a bus to a white man in 1950s America. The action prompted a massive outpouring of anger and sparked the rise of the civil rights movement. Angela Bassett, Cicely Tyson and Peter Francis James star.(n)

programme.title: Untamed Love
programme.desc: A teacher who specialises in tutoring children with learning difficulties forms a close bond with a violent girl traumatised by years of physical and psychological abuse. Fact-based drama, starring Cathy Lee Crosby, Ashlee Lauren, John Getz and Richard Fancy.

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh

programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Clive Owen star in this sword-clashing adventure of a fallen warrior who rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master

programme.desc: Documentary charting controversial comedian Russell Brand's journey from being a troubled youth in Essex to a Hollywood star, hooked on drugs, sex and fame until his unexpected evolution into a political activist

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: When a ten-year-old boy (Freddie Highmore) discovers a magical world of tiny people living in his backyard, he must save them from the impending demolition of his home. programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave

Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a ticket taker at the local cinema believes he is the son of God and must decide on the eternal fate of everyone he comes in contact with. Stars William H. Macy and Neve Campbell

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria
programme.desc: At the peak of her international career, film star Maria Enders (Juliette Binoche) comes face-to-face with an uncomfortable reflection of herself while starring in a revival of the play that made her famous twenty years ago. Co-starring Kristen Stewart and Chlo� Grace Moretz

But over a decade later, while his peers are taking home MVP awards and championship trophies, Lenny has never played a minute in the NBA. What went wrong? A quintessentially American story about dreaming big, the fickle nature of sports celebrity and the unfulfilled destiny of a man for whom superstardom was only just out of reach

programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Whiskers
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Jed (Michael Caloz) arranges for the Egyptian goddess of felines to turn his cuddly cat into a kid. However, since cat years and human years figure differently, "Whiskers" is now a thirty-year-old man. Jacob Tierney costars in this cat comedy

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Ben Stiller created and stars in this fashion industry spoof as IQ-challenged supermodel Derek Zoolander, a vain and sweetly stupid hunk who is brainwashed by evil designer Mugatu into becoming a top-secret assassin. Owen Wilson and Will Ferrell costar in this satirical comedy

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Candy and Brandy
programme.desc: A couple's relationship endures a dramatic confrontation that leads to a painful breakup - a situation most notable for the fact that they are portrayed by children in this award-winning tone poem from Spanish filmmaker Ander Duque

programme.title: Whiskers
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Jed (Michael Caloz) arranges for the Egyptian goddess of felines to turn his cuddly cat into a kid. However, since cat years and human years figure differently, "Whiskers" is now a thirty-year-old man. Jacob Tierney costars in this cat comedy

programme.title: Jesus Town, U.S.A.
programme.desc: Comedic documentary about a small Oklahoma town and their ambitious yearly theatrical endeavor: staging the passion play with over 100 cast members to the backdrop of a bizarre reproduction of Jerusalem built in the foothills of the Wichita mountains. Despite being an 88-year-old tradition, the play is struggling to find an audience and the young man who plays the role of Jesus has a secret revelation that could change everything

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."

programme.title: Rugrats In Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The Finsters and the Pickles travel to the City of Lights, where Chucky hopes that his dad Chas will find him a new mother while he repairs the malfunctioning reptiles at a European dinosaur theme park. Based on the beloved Nickelodeon series, this animated family adventure features the voices of Christine Cavanaugh, Elizabeth Daily, Susan Sarandon, Michael Bell, Cheryl Chase, John Lithgow, Debbie Reynolds, Mako, Casey Kasem and Tim Curry

programme.title: Play It Forward
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports presents an emotional story of family, sacrifice and the pursuit of your dreams as candidly told through the lives of legendary NFL tight end and future Hall of Fame inductee Tony Gonzalez and his older brother Chris

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Classic tale of the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear who travels to London in search of a home and finds himself lost and alone in Paddington Station until he meets a family who takes him in. It looks as though his luck has changed until he catches the eye of a sinister museum taxidermist, who has an old score to settle. Features Sally Hawkins, Hugh Bonneville, Nicole Kidman and the voice of Ben Whishaw

programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?(n)

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time(n)

programme.title: Hidalgo
programme.desc: Based on the true story of the greatest long-distance horse race ever run, this epic action-adventure set in 1890 follows a down-and-out cowboy who travels to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross-desert horse race. Stars Viggo Mortensen and Omar Sharif(n)

programme.title: The Hunters

programme.title: Sleep Easy, Hutch Rimes
programme.desc: Insurance company owner Hutch Rimes (Steven Weber) can't stop fooling around with his assistants, a fact that gets him in hot water when his stenographer Olivia (Gail O'Grady) asks for help in killing her husband (Stephen Tobolowsky). Making things worse is the fact that Hutch has tried murdering an abusive spouse before, and the angry hubby he nearly killed has just been released from jail. Swoosie Kurtz, Nina Siemaszko and Stacey Travis costar in this award-winning thriller
