programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp. Stars Shirley MacLaine, Jack Black and Matthew McConaughey. Richard Linklater directs

programme.title: Gravy
programme.desc: Comic horror flick about a group of employees in a Mexican Cantina who are terrorized by a trio of cannibals, who lock the staff in the restaurant and go on a Halloween night killing spree. Stars Sutton Foster

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

Stars Cuba Gooding Jr

programme.desc: A group of gay activists work to support the miners of a tiny Welsh village during their lengthy strike in the summer of 1984. Inspired by an extraordinary true story

programme.title: Manglehorn
programme.desc: Academy Award� winner Al Pacino stars as a reclusive small town locksmith who has never quite recovered from losing the love of his life but as he begins to forge tenuous human connections and approach the possibility of new love, he finds himself at a crossroads between the past and present. Also stars Academy Award� winner Holly Hunter

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: This classic holiday romantic comedy interweaves the stories of nine contemporary Londoners, from the handsome bachelor Prime Minister who falls for a junior staffer to a schoolboy with a crush, as they wrestle with the funny, poignant and often silly side of love. Stars Laura Linney, Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Colin Firth and Alan Rickman

programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild

programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room

programme.desc: The death of one of their own reunites a group of lifelong friends who have gone their separate ways. Back together for the first time since high school, they hash out their pasts and confront what pulled them apart(n)

programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare(n)

programme.title: Good Advice
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars as a successful stockbroker who, after losing his fortune on a bad stock tip, decides to secretly write into his ex-girlfriend's less-than-successful advice column, setting of a romantic chain of events. Also stars Denise Richards and Rosanna Arquette(n)

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People

Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star(n)

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: A closeted gay teen wants to join the popular girls' clique, but his scheme backfires when his best friend is forced out of the closet instead. Stars Megan Mullally and Natasha Lyonne(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare(n)

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: Lena Dunham directs and stars as a young woman who returns home after college to her mother's New York apartment and careens through life looking for work, romantic possibilities and meaning, in all the wrong places(n)

programme.title: It's Always Fair Weather
programme.desc: World War II service buddies reunite in a New York City bar 10 years after their discharge only to find they haven't that much in common anymore, until one of them gets in over his head with mobsters and the other two try to help him out of the jam. Directed by Stanley Donen and Gene Kelly, who stars as one of the three GIs

programme.title: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg
programme.desc: A 17-year-old French girl falls in love, but her widowed mother objects to her marriage plans. Expressing themselves through the songs of this jazz musical, the leads ponder the prospect of changing their lives forever

programme.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
programme.desc: Americana tunefest set against the backdrop of the impending 1904 World's Fair in St. Louis, as a family learn their father's business is transferring him to New York City, and his four daughters argue that they don't want to move. Songs include "The Boy Next Door," "The Trolley Song" and "Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas

programme.title: City Lights
programme.desc: The beloved Tramp character falls for a beautiful, blind flower girl, and uses his friendship with a rich man to help her family as he woos her

programme.title: Rebel Without a Cause
programme.desc: Inarticulate teenage alienation, rebelliousness and torment break out in violence in this character study about a sullen youth (James Dean) who moves with his parents to a well-to-do Los Angeles suburb, where he finds love, friendship and new enemies

programme.title: Melody Cruise
programme.desc: Good songs and nice production numbers tied to a plot about a ladies' man (Phil Harris) and his escapades. Pete: Charles Ruggles. Laurie: Helen Mack. Ann: Greta Nissen. Hickey: Chick Chandler. Zoe: June Brewster. Mrs. Wells: Marjorie Gateson. Pleasant vintage entertainment. Mark Sandrich directed

programme.title: Cockeyed Cavaliers
programme.desc: Bert Wheeler and Robert Woolsey burlesque of merry Olde England. Lady Genevieve: Thelma Todd. Mary Ann: Dorothy Lee. Baron: Noah Beery. Duke of Weskit: Robert Greig. Physicians: Jack Norton, Snub Pollard. Town Crier: Franklin Pangborn. Directed by Mark Sandrich ("Top Hat")

programme.title: A Woman Rebels
programme.desc: An independent woman defies convention in Victorian England by having a child out of wedlock and refusing wedding proposals until she is financially sound

programme.title: Outcast Lady
programme.desc: A girl (Constance Bennett) from a poor family loves an aristocrat (Herbert Marshall). Hugh Williams, Ralph Forbes. Lady Eve: Mrs. Patrick Campbell. Venice: Elizabeth Allan. Robert Z. Leonard directed

programme.title: Riptide
programme.desc: While her British nobleman husband is on business in the U.S., a fun-loving American heiress holidays in the Riviera, where she runs into a former boyfriend whose reckless behavior leads to scandal and compels the husband to initiate divorce proceedings

programme.title: The Flame Within
programme.desc: A psychiatrist finds herself in over her head when she falls in love with her own patient, who is not only very troubled, but also is already married

programme.title: Make Way for a Lady
programme.desc: An impulsive teenager tries to play matchmaker between her widower-dad and a novelist, unaware that he has already fallen for one of her high-school teachers

programme.title: Woman Against Woman
programme.desc: Comedy-drama about a lawyer (Herbert Marshall), his new wife (Virginia Bruce) and his trouble-making ex-wife (Mary Astor). Mrs. Kingsley: Marjorie Rambeau. Mrs. Holland: Janet Beecher. Dora: Sarah Padden. Ellen: Juanita Quigley. Robert B. Sinclair directed

programme.title: The Razor's Edge
programme.desc: A disillusioned World War I veteran moves to Paris, where he has his heart broken by the woman he loves when she marries another man for his wealth, so he goes off on a journey of self-fulfillment and to seek out the meaning of life in India. (cc)

programme.title: Here Comes the Groom
programme.desc: Frank Capra's light touch is evident in this yarn about a newsman (Bing Crosby) who discovers his fiancee (Jane Wyman) is about to marry another man (Franchot Tone). Alexis Smith. Theresa: Anna Maria Alberghetti. George: Robert Keith. Pa: James Barton

programme.title: Magic Town
programme.desc: A pollster (James Stewart) finds the average American town and manages to upset its routine. Jane Wyman, Kent Smith, Wallace Ford, Ned Sparks, Regis Toomey, Donald Meek. Good story idea burdened by extended development. William A. Wellman directed

programme.title: Larceny, Inc.
programme.desc: Gangsters buy a luggage store with the intention of robbing the neighboring bank, but when the shop thrives, the leader decides that making an honest buck has its advantages

programme.title: Three Guys Named Mike
programme.desc: Light and breezy tale of a stewardess (Jane Wyman) who must choose from among three candidates for marriage: Van Johnson, Howard Keel and Barry Sullivan. Some good laughs. Kathy: Phyllis Kirk. Alice: Jeff Donnell. Charles Walters directed

programme.title: The Doughgirls
programme.desc: During World War II, a honeymooning couple share their Washington, D.C., apartment with three women looking for romance

programme.title: Make Your Own Bed
programme.desc: Private eye (Jack Carson) and girl (Jane Wyman) pose as servants to a tycoon (Alan Hale) to smash a spy plot, with unexpected results. Boris: George Tobias. Vivian: Irene Manning. Knight: Robert Shayne. Marie: Tala Birell. Alten: Ricardo Cortez. Peter Godfrey directed

programme.title: Princess O'Rourke
programme.desc: Director Norman Krasna won the Best Original Screenplay Oscar for his tale about the whirlwind romance between a refugee European princess and an American flying ace that touches off an international incident

programme.title: One More Tomorrow
programme.desc: An incorrigible playboy deals with the two women in his life, one of whom is a photographer, but the two let social differences come between them

programme.title: Honeymoon for Three
programme.desc: An author juggles both his secretary fiancée and a married ex-flame who's convinced she's the inspiration for his new literary heroine

programme.title: The King and the Chorus Girl
programme.desc: A European monarch attempts to woo and win a down-to-earth American dancer who works at the Folies Bergere in Paris. The script was cowritten by Groucho Marx

programme.title: The Fountainhead
programme.desc: Ayn Rand's study of a brilliant architect (Gary Cooper) whose integrity allows no compromise in his work. Dominique: Patricia Neal. Wynand: Raymond Massey. Keating: Kent Smith. Cameron: Henry Hull. Toohey: Robert Douglas. Dean: Paul Stanton. Enright: Ray Collins. Directed by King Vidor

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: A Manhattan sophisticate escorts wealthy men, taking extravagant gifts and money but not their affections: she has commitment issues

programme.title: A Face in the Crowd
programme.desc: The study of a megalomaniacal TV personality (Andy Griffith in his film debut), whose guitar and folksy humor take him from an Arkansas jail to national popularity. The movie offers a satire of television, pop culture and the public fascination with celebrity

programme.title: The Saint in New York
programme.desc: First entry in "The Saint" series finds the charming but deadly criminal-turned-sleuth hired by a coterie of businessmen to rid New York City of racketeers, which he does quite judiciously except for one especially venal crime czar who continues to elude him(n)

programme.title: The Saint Strikes Back
programme.desc: A sleuth becomes involved in underworld activities in San Francisco(n)

programme.title: The Saint in London
programme.desc: A suave soldier-of-fortune-turned-sleuth helps Scotland Yard round up counterfeiters who've also dabbled in murder(n)

programme.title: The Saint's Double Trouble

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Zbiór praktycznych porad dotyczących życia. Twórcy radzą m.in., jak przygotować coś dobrego do jedzenia lub zrobić ciekawy prezent bądź przydatny gadżet z rozmaitych przedmiotów codziennego użytku

programme.title: Włoskie smaki Micheli
programme.desc: Tym razem Michaela daje popis swoich umiejętności, jeśli chodzi o dania z makaronu, z których słynie włoska kuchnia. Ponadto pokaże niezawodny sposób na przygotowanie pysznej domowej pizzy

programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Norwegię
programme.desc: Brytyjskie ekspertki stylu Trinny Woodall i Susannah Constantine podróżują po całym świecie, pomagając zaniedbanym kobietom przeobrazić się w ikony stylu. Tym razem jadą do Norwegii

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Ma zostać wznowiony proces, który już kiedyś wygrała Jane ratując przed eksmisją rodzinę kierowcy, który zginął w wypadku samochodowym. Deb musi jeszcze raz podjąć walkę

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Kim zajmuje się sprawą psa, zwanego David Beckham. Pies zdechł. Jego właściciel polecił go sklonować. Choć kopia jest łudząco podobna do oryginału, pies nie potrafi się właściwie zachowywać

programme.title: Żony za kółkiem
programme.desc: Panie, które niezbyt dobrze radzą sobie z prowadzeniem auta zasiadają na miejscu kierowcy. Instruktorami będą... ich partnerzy. Każda para ma trzy dni na poznanie techniki jazdy samochodem(r)

programme.title: 24 godziny online.pl
programme.desc: Reporterzy z całej Polski prezentują aktualne wydarzenia z kraju oraz ze świata. Każdego dnia widzowie otrzymają zestaw sprawdzonych informacji, które mogą mieć znaczący wpływ na ich życie

programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: Prezentacja prawdziwych, najczęściej wykonywanych w Polsce, zabiegów chirurgicznych. Tu nie ma miejsca na scenariusz. Przez kilka miesięcy kamera towarzyszy lekarzom oraz pacjentom jednego z największych szpitali publicznych. Rejestruje chwile od momentu diagnozy poprzez przygotowania do operacji, sam zabieg aż do efektu leczenia. W programie nie zabraknie także autentycznych emocji: obawy, cierpienia, ulgi czy radości. Młody mężczyzna ma raka języka. Specjaliści starają się usunąć guza tak, by pacjent nie stracił mowy. Widzowie poznają też historię dziewczyny, która cierpi z powodu bardzo wysuniętej żuchwy

programme.title: The best of...
programme.desc: Największe hity muzyki polskiej i zagranicznej z wybranego roku

programme.title: Program muzyczny
programme.desc: Zestawienie największych przebojów z Polski i zagranicy

programme.title: Taka sytuacja
programme.desc: Gdy w rodzinie pojawia się dziecko cały świat przewraca się do góry nogami. Zaczynamy inaczej spędzać czas i wydawać pieniądze. O swoich doświadczeniach opowiedzą goście

programme.title: Sala operacyjna: waga ciężka
programme.desc: Karolina została przyjęta do szpitala warunkowo, bo znowu przytyła. Coraz bardziej dokucza jej ból kręgosłupa. Prof. Paśnik kwalifikuje ją do operacji. Z kolei 40-letni Artur jest bohaterem pierwszej edycji "Sali operacyjnej", kiedy to jego waga wynosiła 150 kg. Po zabiegu schudł 55 kg i nadal trzyma formę. Artur stara się wykorzystać swoją wiedzę i doświadczenie, by pomagać innym. Przyjechał do szpitala na konsultację z dietetykiem, bo pomimo starań przestał chudnąć. Dodatkowym problemem jest wisząca skóra - pamiątka po utraconych kilogramach. Tymczasem Ela zdecydowała się wreszcie iść na zakupy po nowe ubrania

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta

programme.desc: Reporterzy z całej Polski prezentują aktualne wydarzenia z kraju oraz ze świata. Każdego dnia widzowie otrzymają zestaw sprawdzonych informacji, które mogą mieć znaczący wpływ na ich życie

programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: Prezentacja prawdziwych, najczęściej wykonywanych w Polsce, zabiegów chirurgicznych. Tu nie ma miejsca na scenariusz. Przez kilka miesięcy kamera towarzyszy lekarzom oraz pacjentom jednego z największych szpitali publicznych. Rejestruje chwile od momentu diagnozy poprzez przygotowania do operacji, sam zabieg aż do efektu leczenia. W programie nie zabraknie także autentycznych emocji: obawy, cierpienia, ulgi czy radości. Młody mężczyzna został pchnięty nożem. Lekarze, by go ratować, decydują się na nowatorski zabieg wszczepienia zastawki trójdzielnej - to druga taka operacja w historii polskiej kardiochirurgii

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta

programme.title: 24 godziny online.pl
programme.desc: Reporterzy z całej Polski prezentują aktualne wydarzenia z kraju oraz ze świata. Każdego dnia widzowie otrzymają zestaw sprawdzonych informacji, które mogą mieć znaczący wpływ na ich życie

programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: Prezentacja prawdziwych, najczęściej wykonywanych w Polsce, zabiegów chirurgicznych. Tu nie ma miejsca na scenariusz. Przez kilka miesięcy kamera towarzyszy lekarzom oraz pacjentom jednego z największych szpitali publicznych. Rejestruje chwile od momentu diagnozy poprzez przygotowania do operacji, sam zabieg aż do efektu leczenia. W programie nie zabraknie także autentycznych emocji: obawy, cierpienia, ulgi czy radości. Młody mężczyzna został pchnięty nożem. Lekarze, by go ratować, decydują się na nowatorski zabieg wszczepienia zastawki trójdzielnej - to druga taka operacja w historii polskiej kardiochirurgii

programme.title: Full House

programme.desc: Danny (Bob Saget) is a dad on the spot when D.J. and Stephanie have simultaneous school functions they want him to attend. D.J.: Candace Cameron. Stephanie: Jodie Sweetin. Jesse: John Stamos. Joey: Dave Coulier. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Is Fine
programme.desc: Ross's bogus reaction to Joey and Rachel's romance leads to a disastrous dinner date with them, a confused Charlie and too many margaritas. Meanwhile, Chandler slips up in front of a couple's adopted son; and Frank Jr. (Giovanni Ribisi) returns to ask Phoebe a very important---and inappropriate---favor. Charlie: Aisha Tyler. Owen: Daryl Sabara. Colleen: Kelly Waymire. (repeat)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The return of their cloying old chum (Jennifer Coolidge) pits Monica against Phoebe; Joey and Rachel have a hard time getting romantic with one another; and a series of tanning-salon snafus leads to a Ross of a different color. (repeat)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Emma's first birthday goes from cute to criminal after Rachel realizes that her bunny-shaped cake would feel more at home at a bachelorette party. (repeat)

programme.sub-title: Where There's a Will, There's a Way

programme.desc: While caring for Nicky, Will soon discovers he's a big man on campus with the women. Candace: Juliette Jeffers. Todd: David Coburn. Jake: James Gleason. Jackie: Tyra. Will: Will Smith. (repeat)

programme.sub-title: It's Better to Have Loved and Lost It...

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: Ernie tells George that the factory is moving to Mexico and that they'll both be out of jobs; Benny flees when she learns that the police want to question her about a robbery; a nauseated Angie awaits the results of a home-pregnancy test; Carmen is afraid to open her final college letter after three rejections; Max is tempted by beer; and Vic prepares to propose to a young woman he barely knows. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: Angie tells George she's pregnant, and Benny's off to jail after she's arrested as an accessory to the convenience-store robbery. So George has to find a lawyer (Adam West). And that won't be his only expense: Carmen got accepted into college. Meanwhile, Vic announces that he's getting married again, to a 27-year-old. Judge Alvarez: Marilyn Milian. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: George Nieces a New Media Room
programme.desc: The Lopez house becomes too crowded for comfort when niece Veronica (Aimee Garcia) and her boyfriend, Mike (Jason Connery), move in. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: At her trial, Benny must rely on George's testimony since her lawyer (Adam West) and even her mother (Rita Moreno) have all turned on her. Judge Alvarez: Marilyn Milian. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: Sabes Gay, It's George's Fantasy Episode
programme.desc: George hallucinates that he and Ernie are gay and about to be married after downing a worm along with his drink at Thirsty's Bar, where he has gone to drown his sorrows after a humiliating day at work. programme.title: Rated A for Awesome
programme.desc: Double bill. The team tries to help when Thera fears a trip to the dentist. Then, the team awesome-ises Lars' voice, making it so smooth and seductive that no one can resist him.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: When Howie Met Randy/Bro Money Bro Problems'.
programme.desc: Double bill. In a flashback episode, six-year-old Randy tries to convince new kid Howard that Norrisville has a Ninja by sneaking out of daycare and into the high school. Then, when Randy lets Howard sell used Ninja weapons for cash, the boys unwittingly sell them to Viceroy, who uses the weapons to build the Ninja's ultimate foe.

programme.title: Wander Over Yonder
programme.desc: Double bill. Sylvia wakes to find she and a sleeping Wander are imprisoned on Hater's ship and must fight to escape. Then, Wander has to avoid obstacles to stop Sylvia waking up at night.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Ponzi finds a `no weirdos' rule in the school handbook so invites himself to the Wright home to get the evidence he needs to kick Spencer out of school.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.sub-title: School of Rockers/How to Impress Ladies.
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer fears he is going to bomb at the school talent show, but when Billy gets mixed into a batch of Jane's brownies, Spencer has bigger problems. Then, Spencer is nominated for an award, but is only allowed to take one guest to the ceremony.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: The Curse of Tutankitty's Tomb/Pet Peeved.
programme.desc: Double bill. Egyptian artifacts at the museum turn out to be high-tech relics from Kat's world. Coop tries to evade his school group and a very nosy security guard to stop Kat from opening a portal. Then, Millie finds a new friend and begins to ignore Kat.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Kat's hearing is accidentally enhanced, so Coop decides to make a lot of noise and even gets Millie to sing to him. Later, Dad starts extreme renovations on the house and Kate worries he will discover his hidden weapon and food store.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy has to learn a valuable lesson about respect and humility after accidently breaking his sword. Then, a freaky new exchange student threatens to ruin Randy and Howard's friendship.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. The Ninja must save the town from a giant robot. School Spirit Week turns into a disaster when Howard is possessed by a mythical demon bird.

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. The half-boy, half-oyster pretends he is a snowboarding expert, even though he has never done it before. Then, Rafik asks Boyster to make him some pearls to impress new girl Claudine.

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: When the kings refuse to date two goat sisters, they are changed into ugly versions of themselves by a curse, which can only be broken by dancing with the fairest girls in the village.

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.sub-title: I'm Gonna Git You, Sponge Sucka.
